statements: SELECT * FROM maintenance_history;
SELECT repair_date, repair_cost FROM maintenance_history WHERE instrument_id = 101;
SELECT instrument_id, repair_details FROM maintenance_history WHERE repair_cost > 500;
SELECT technician_name, repair_cost FROM maintenance_history WHERE repair_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_history ORDER BY repair_date DESC, repair_cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_history WHERE repair_cost > 1000 ORDER BY technician_name ASC
SELECT instrument_id, repair_date, repair_details FROM maintenance_history WHERE repair_cost < 5000 ORDER BY repair_date DESC
SELECT technician_name, repair_date, repair_cost FROM maintenance_history WHERE instrument_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY repair_cost ASC, repair_date DESC
SELECT instrument_id, technician_name FROM maintenance_history WHERE repair_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY instrument_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(instrument_id), AVG(repair_cost) FROM maintenance_history WHERE technician_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM InstrumentRepair WHERE repair_type='String Replacement';
SELECT repair_id, repair_date, repair_details FROM InstrumentRepair WHERE repair_id=100;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_details FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_type='Tuning';
SELECT instrument_id, repair_date, repair_type FROM InstrumentRepair WHERE repair_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_date<'2022-06-01';
SELECT repair_id, instrument_id, repair_date, repair_type, repair_details FROM InstrumentRepair WHERE repair_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_type = 'Tuning' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_repairs FROM InstrumentRepair;
SELECT instrument_id, MAX(repair_date) AS last_repair_date FROM InstrumentRepair GROUP BY instrument_id;
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_date, instrument_id, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_history WHERE repair_type = 'Tuning';
SELECT id, repair_type, repair_date FROM maintenance_history WHERE repair_type = 'Cleaning' ORDER BY repair_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT instrument_id FROM maintenance_history;
SELECT name, brand, type FROM instruments WHERE brand = 'Yamaha';
SELECT name, specialization FROM technicians WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_history WHERE repair_type = 'Calibration' AND repair_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT instrument_id, repair_type FROM maintenance_history ORDER BY repair_date DESC;
SELECT instruments.name, maintenance_history.repair_type FROM instruments INNER JOIN maintenance_history ON instruments.id = maintenance_history.instrument_id WHERE repair_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT technicians.name, technicians.specialization, instruments.name FROM technicians LEFT JOIN instruments ON technicians.id = instruments.id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_repairs, repair_type FROM maintenance_history GROUP BY repair_type ORDER BY total_repairs DESC;
SELECT * FROM Maintenance_History;
SELECT instrument_name, repair_date, repair_description FROM Maintenance_History WHERE repair_cost > 100;
SELECT instrument_name, repair_description, repair_cost FROM Maintenance_History WHERE repair_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT instrument_name, repair_description, repair_cost FROM Maintenance_History WHERE instrument_name = 'Guitar' ORDER BY repair_date DESC;
SELECT instrument_name, repair_cost FROM Maintenance_History WHERE repair_description LIKE '%broken%' ORDER BY repair_date ASC;
SELECT instrument_name, repair_date, repair_description FROM Maintenance_History;
SELECT * FROM Instruments WHERE purchase_price > 1000;
SELECT instrument_name, repair_date, repair_cost FROM Maintenance_History WHERE repair_cost > 500;

SELECT Instruments.instrument_name, Technicians.technician_name FROM Instruments JOIN Repairs ON Instruments.instrument_id = Repairs.instrument_id JOIN Technicians ON Repairs.technician_id = Technicians.technician_id;
SELECT instrument_name, repair_date FROM Maintenance_History WHERE repair_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_history;
SELECT instrument_id, repair_description FROM maintenance_history WHERE repair_date='2022-01-15';
SELECT instrument_name, serial_number FROM instruments ORDER BY instrument_name DESC;
SELECT type_name, description FROM maintenance_types WHERE id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, technician_name FROM technicians WHERE technician_email='example@example.com';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_history WHERE repair_date >= '2022-01-01' AND repair_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY repair_date DESC;

SELECT mh.id, mh.repair_date, mh.repair_description, i.instrument_name FROM maintenance_history mh INNER JOIN instruments i ON mh.instrument_id = i.id WHERE mh.maintenance_type = 'Calibration' ORDER BY mh.repair_date ASC;

SELECT mh.id, mh.maintenance_type, r.repair_cost, mt.type_name FROM maintenance_history mh INNER JOIN repairs r ON mh.id = r.maintenance_id INNER JOIN maintenance_types mt ON mh.maintenance_type = mt.type_name WHERE r.repair_cost > 500 ORDER BY r.repair_cost DESC;

SELECT mh.id, mh.repair_date, t.technician_name, t.technician_email FROM maintenance_history mh INNER JOIN technicians t ON mh.id = t.id WHERE t.technician_email LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY mh.repair_date DESC;

SELECT mh.id, mh.repair_date, mh.repair_description, i.serial_number FROM maintenance_history mh INNER JOIN instruments i ON mh.instrument_id = i.id WHERE i.serial_number LIKE 'SN%' ORDER BY mh.repair_date ASC;
